short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Handle, visualize, export and import the study plan at https://phd-ai-society.di.unipi.it/training/

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It allows to easily filter courses through a dedicated interactive plot, export and import a study plan and check its validity.

For the full guide go to https://github.com/FrancescoDiCursi/unipi-ai4society-plan-assistant
